sentences.en: Any resemblance of a character in this book to a living person is purely incidental.
sentences.cn: 书中人物如有雷同,纯属巧合.

sentences.en: As a result, the administrative proceedings should not be incidental civil action.
sentences.cn: 因此, 行政诉讼中不应附带民事诉讼.

sentences.en: At the bottom of the bill, you will notice various incidental expenses such as faxes.
sentences.cn: 在账单底部，你会发现有传真等各项杂费。

sentences.en: At times, as in this case, the finding is incidental.
sentences.cn: 有时, 比如在本例中, 病变的发现是偶然的.

sentences.en: Can you lump all these items together under the heading'incidental expenses '?
sentences.cn: 你们能不能把所有这些项目归纳在'临时费'项下?

sentences.en: Fatigue is incidental to a journey [ to traveling ] in a strange land.
sentences.cn: 在陌生的地方 旅行,容易疲劳.

sentences.en: Increased motivation is more than an incidental benefit of reward schemes.
sentences.cn: 积极性提高不仅仅是奖励计划附带的益处。

sentences.en: Please merge all these items together under the item of " incidental expenses ".
sentences.cn: 把这些费用归并列入 “ 杂费 ” 项内.

sentences.en: Some are asymptomatic and discovered as an incidental radiologic finding.
sentences.cn: 这些病人仅在偶然的放射线检查时才被发现.

sentences.en: That is incidental to my story.
The discovery was incidental to their main research.
sentences.cn: 这一发现是他们主要研究中的附带收获。

sentences.en: The firm allows him a hundred pound a week for incidental expenses.
sentences.cn: 公司每周给他100英镑作为杂费.

sentences.en: The tone of the Cabinet is veered by every incidental change of war.
sentences.cn: 内阁因战况的偶然变化而改变意见.

sentences.en: We shall not be liable for incidental or consequential damages.
sentences.cn: 本公司对附带损坏或间接损坏不负任何责任.

sentences.en: Yeobright was too deeply absorbed in the ramblings incidental to his remorseful state to notice her.
sentences.cn: 姚伯由于一意痛悔,只顾胡说乱道,所以就不顾得留神她的情形了.

sentences.en: You should know the additional responsibilities that are incidental to the job.
sentences.cn: 你该知道做这项工作要承担额外责任.

words.tran_cn: [光] 入射的；附带的；易发生的，伴随而来的
发生率；影响；[光] 入射；影响范围
附带的；偶然的；容易发生的
附带事件；偶然事件；杂项

trans.tran_cn: 附属的，易发生的，偶然发生的，伴随发生的
trans.tran_en: happening or existing in connection with something else that is more important

trans.tran_cn: 附带事件，伴随事件，杂费，非主要的附带项或费用
